title: How about a break; You can do it
creator_credit: Debby Kingsland, Suzanne Baker and Film Australia
brief_description: Two short films in one. The first shows the frustration’s faced by an ‘average’ housewife, the second, the benefits of engaging in recreational activities outside the home. Cast includes Max Cullen, Julie Dawson, Kate Whiteley, Beth Whiteley.
